# Part 1 

### Tidy up the data ready for regression

Load libraries and data:

```{r, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}

library(car)
library(tidyverse)
library(modelr)
library(GGally)
library(relaimpo)
library(lm.beta)

houses <- read_csv("data/kc_house_data.csv")

```
